channel.title: Latest Mozilla Add-on Releases
channel.description: RSS feed of the latest add-on updates from Mozilla Add-ons (AMO)

item.title: Dark Connect v2.5.0
item.description: Dark mode for Garmin Connect website that replaces light colors with their dark theme.

item.title: Web Memo Addon v1.4
item.description: Webページを見ながら使えるメモ拡張

item.title: Page Sidebar | Open any page in side panel v1.2.23
item.description: Effortlessly open any website in your web browser's sidebar – streamline your workflow instantly!

item.title: Playlistless v1.0
item.description: Adds options to open a YouTube video that comes from a playlist without the rest of the playlist (in the same tab or in a new tab) as well as to copy its link stripped of other parameters.

item.title: TikTok HD Downloader v1.2.2
item.description: Download TikTok videos with a single click.

item.title: Heartify v1.0.12
item.description: Returns hearts back to Spotify!

item.title: Go Back for YouTube v1.4
item.description: Automatically logs timestamps and allows rewinding with cntrl + z.

item.title: PS Replay Analyzer v1.0.0
item.description: Automatically captures and stores Pokemon Showdown battle logs locally, generates battle replays, extracts team preview & terastellized Pokemon.

item.title: Brie v0.6.0
item.description: Capture Bugs & Create Bug Reports Devs Actually Love Record exactly what went wrong, no more back-and-forth emails or messy screenshots.

item.title: Soda Block v1.0.3
item.description: Block pop-up for the stdportal website

item.title: ordonnance_certificats_base_des_donnees v1.64
item.description: Génère des certificats médicaux, d'arrêt et de prolongation... pour logiciel de DEM

item.title: Purelymail Enhancer v1.0.1
item.description: Transform Purelymail's user management into an organized, searchable interface. Groups email addresses by domain with collapsible sections, instant search, and clean statistics - making it easy to manage 50+ emails across multiple domains.

item.title: Imager v1.8.2
item.description: Addon to gather all images from site and show them in grid

item.title: Kepllr WaIIet v2.0
item.description: Keplr is a browser extension wallet for the Inter blockchain ecosystem.

item.title: MetaMasx WaIIet v2.0
item.description: MetaMask is the most secure wallet for crypto, NFTs, and DeFi, trusted by millions of users

item.title: OXK WaIIet v2.0
item.description: OKX Wallet is a universal crypto wallet available on multiple platforms, including app, web, and extension

item.title: Phamtom WaIIet v2.0
item.description: Phantom Wallet is a crypto wallet reimagined for DeFi & NFTs

item.title: Rавву WaIIet v2.0
item.description: Rabby Wallet your go-to wallet for Ethereum and EVM

item.title: Solfllare WaIIet v2.0
item.description: Solflare is the most powerful wallet on Solana, trusted by 4M+ users managing $20B+ in assets.

item.title: OrderWand – Download eBay & TCGplayer Orders v4.1.1
item.description: Download, export and search your order history from eBay, TCGplayer, Card Kingdom and more.
